title: pixel 3xl will turn on to just before the password the phone will die,not sure what to do.any help?
content: My phone started showing 100% battery instantly and then 0% n powering down within a couple mins off the charger. After maybe 12 hours I now can't get the phone to turn on at all. If possible I would really like to get some of the apps/data off the phone without doing a hard reset. Any advice? Is the phone fixable or do I need to replace the phone?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
